metadata.title: CVE-2021-46244 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description: A Divide By Zero vulnerability exists in HDF5 v1.13.1-1 vis the functionH5T__complete_copy () at /hdf5/src/H5T.c. This vulnerability causes anaritmetic exception, leading to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
kissplice package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
paraview package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
xdmf package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
